events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but it doesn't fit me at all. I would like to request a refund for this item as soon as possible.
The case has been categorized under refund requests based on the customer's mention of returning the item and requesting money back.
The refund specialist team has been assigned to handle the customer's refund request and follow up accordingly.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I understand you want to initiate a refund for your jacket. I'm here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in its original packaging for us to process the refund?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The jacket is brand new, I haven't worn it and itâ€™s still in the original packaging.
Thank you for the information. We will send you a prepaid return shipping label via email shortly. Upon receiving the jacket, we will process your refund within 5 business days.
Thanks, that sounds great. I appreciate the quick response and look forward to receiving the return label soon.
The return label has been emailed to you successfully. Please send back the jacket at your earliest convenience so we can complete the refund process.
We wanted to check in and see if you have sent back the jacket using the return label we provided. Let us know if you need any further assistance.
Yes, I dropped off the package at the post office yesterday. I expect the refund to be processed soon. Thanks for following up.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund today. You should see the amount credited back to your original payment method within a few days.
Please take a moment to complete our satisfaction survey regarding your recent refund experience. Your feedback helps us improve our service.
I completed the survey and rated the experience highly. Thank you for your prompt and helpful support throughout the refund process.
Closing the case now as the refund has been completed and the customer has expressed satisfaction with the support received.
